name: World Generation Tech Prototype
description:
This is a tech prototype for Game Development 2 class, term 3.  In this project, I tried to implement automatic random terrain generation, including Terrain's Shape, different TerrainLayer according to different heights, Niches and Water. This is an unfinished Prototype, which is not strictly speaking a game.

Players can use the hotkeys I set to experience the fun of random control of terrain generation. 

Controls: 

Create an entire landscape with everything on it (Terrain, Terrain Layers, Niches etc. ) - Key M

Delete Water - Key Z

Delete Pink Cube Niche - Key X

Delete Tree - Key C

Delete Crystal AI - Key V

Generate Random Landscape - Key P

Give Terrain Layer to the Terrain - Key O

Install Water into the Landscape - Key I

Install Crystal into the Landscape  - Key U

Install Pink Cubes into the Landscape - Key Y

Install Tree into the Landscape - Key T

Reset Terrain - Key L

Smooth Terrain - Key K

Quit Application - Key G

Please enjoy making your own landscape!
